items.sentence: Unfortunately, I don\'t have so much money on me.
You should give Tom a harmonica for his birthday.
You should inform your mother as soon as you can.
You should let Tom know that you need to do that.
You should talk to Tom and tell him how you feel.
Tom plans to live in Boston for more than a year.
Tom probably knows why the meeting was postponed.
Tom put his arm around Mary and kissed her cheek.
Tom doesn\'t seem to be playing with a full deck.
Tom doesn\'t spend enough time with his children.
